<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">众所周知，编程几乎已经成为各行各业不可或缺的重要技能储备，它能够以无法替代的方式帮助我们组织并维护大型系统，因此如今越来越多的人才也开始踏上这条学习之路。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:
"Tahoma",sans-serif;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">5 Coding Challenges to
Help You Train Your Brain<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">大家可以通过交互式平台学习编程，也可以从各类教程及论著当中汲取营养</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">——</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">每个人的学习轨迹不同，选择的学习方式亦有所区别。不过，有时候单凭这些资源还不足完全解决问题，我们更需要找到新的实践锻炼途径。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;

minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;
